mapper.select: SELECT @rownum:=@rownum + 1 AS NUM , A.COUNTRY AS COUNTRYID , CASE WHEN B.KOREAN_NM IS NULL THEN B.ENGLISH_NM ELSE B.KOREAN_NM END AS COUNTRYNAME , A.CONFIRMED , A.DEATHS , A.RECOVERED , DATE_FORMAT(A.UPDATED_DATE, '%Y년%m월%d일') AS UPDATEDDATE FROM DEV_CORONA.WORLD_DAILY A JOIN DEV_CORONA.COUNTRY_INFO B ON A.COUNTRY = B.ID WHERE DATE_FORMAT(A.UPDATED_DATE, '%y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y%m%d') AND (@rownum:=0) = 0 ORDER BY A.CONFIRMED DESC

SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS NUM , DATE_FORMAT(A.UPDATED_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS UPDATEDDATE , CASE WHEN B.KOREAN_NM IS NULL THEN B.ENGLISH_NM ELSE B.KOREAN_NM END AS COUNTRYNAME , A.CONFIRMED , A.DEATHS , A.RECOVERED FROM DEV_CORONA.WORLD_DAILY A JOIN DEV_CORONA.COUNTRY_INFO B ON A.COUNTRY = B.ID WHERE A.COUNTRY = #{COUNTRY} AND (@rownum:=0) = 0 ORDER BY A.UPDATED_DATE DESC LIMIT 30
SELECT ENGLISH_NM FROM DEV_CORONA.COUNTRY_INFO ORDER BY ID
